thread.title: Moomins are more successful than ever
thread.title_full: Moomins are more successful than ever

title: Moomins are more successful than ever
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Moomins are more successful than ever Moominmamma was a centre of attention at Olympia Alamy Nic Fildes Technology & Communications Editor Published at 12:01AM, October 19 2015 
Finland has produced exports that have made their mark all over the world, from Nokia phones to the Molotov Cocktail, and the EKG heart monitor to Angry Birds — but all of them must bow to the might of the Moomins. 
The comic strip community of hippo-shaped trolls have been a mainstay of Finland’s creative success for 70 years and they were reinforcing the point at the Brand & Licensing Europe event held at Kensington Olympia last week. 
Amid lavish Disney and Nickelodeon advertising for their latest characters, a 30ft Marshmallow Man promoting the new Ghostbusters film and a zeppelin-sized Pokemon Subscribe now
